name: Quadruped thoracic rotation left
how_to_perform:
**Step-by-Step Instructions:**

1. Start on all fours with your hands shoulder-width apart and your knees directly under your hips.
2. Engage your core by drawing your belly button towards your spine.
3. On the next breath in, slowly rotate your thoracic spine to the left, keeping your head in line with your shoulders.
4. Aim to rotate from T1-T12 vertebrae, keeping your lower back stable and your pelvis still.
5. Hold for a brief moment, then exhale and return to the starting position.
6. Repeat on the other side by rotating to the right.
short_summary: Rotate thoracic spine while in quadruped position, engaging core and maintaining pelvic stability.
